input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='Balsam Hill Red/Green Outdoor Berry Pine Garland Set of 2'
  - Name='Sullivans 72" Artificial Champagne Pine Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Winston Porter Fabric Leaf Garland Set of 2'
  - Name='Charlton Home Prelit Holiday Christmas 4-Piece Set'
  - Name='Northlight Washington Frasier Fir Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='9 Feet Pre-Lit Snow Flocked Tips Christmas Garland with Red Berries'
  - Name='Northlight 9' x 12" Pre-Lit Flocked Red Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Northlight Real Touch Pre-Lit Mixed Noble Spruce Garland'
  - Name='Sullivans Yuletide Indoor 5.92-Feet Artificial Garland in White | GD1511'
  - Name='Loon Peak Colorado Spruce Lighted Faux Swag'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 2-Pack Pre-Lit Faux Spruce Garland'
  - Name='Mixed Country Pine Lighted Pine Christmas Tree Andover Mills'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 9' Flocked Artificial Christmas Pre-Lit Garland with Clear Lights'
  - Name='Vickerman 100' Canadian Pine Garland'
  - Name='Fraser Lighted Christmas Tree Andover Mills'
  - Name='Coen Norfolk Pine Christmas Garland'
  - Name='7ft Tall Pencil Prelit Artificial Christmas with 210 Warm White LED Lights and 499 Tips Charlton Home'
  - Name='9Ft Pre-Lit Holiday Pre-Decorated Christmas Garland'
  - Name='BrylaneHome 6' Pre-Lit Poinsettia Garland'
  - Name='Northlight 6ft Pre-Lit Decorated Artificial Christmas Garland with Clear Lights'
  - Name='Northlight 27' x 20" Pre-Lit Green Artificial Pine Christmas Garland with Warm White LED Lights'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Red/Green Outdoor Berry Pine Garland Set of 2
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Outdoor pine garland with berry elements, likely artificial and decorative but differs in brand and includes berries, plus quantity (set of 2), still fairly relevant as automotive pine garland with potential lights.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sullivans 72" Artificial Champagne Pine Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial pine garland, slightly shorter length (72 inches vs 108 inches), no explicit mention of lights or battery operation, but similar category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Winston Porter Fabric Leaf Garland Set of 2
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fabric leaf garland implies non-pine artificial material, and set of 2 may suggest decorative use but very different in construction and type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charlton Home Prelit Holiday Christmas 4-Piece Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Includes pre-lit holiday items and garlands but set of 4 pieces reduces focus on single pre-lit pine garland; could be similar in purpose but more general set.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Washington Frasier Fir Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas garland with Fraser Fir type, likely pre-lit but not specified; similar construction and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 9 Feet Pre-Lit Snow Flocked Tips Christmas Garland with Red Berries
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit, same length, similar pine garland but snow flocked tips and red berries differ slightly from undecorated natural look; similar function and style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 9' x 12" Pre-Lit Flocked Red Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit and same size garland but flocked red pine differs in branch style and appearance from Carolina Pine; still similar function and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Real Touch Pre-Lit Mixed Noble Spruce Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial garland with mixed noble spruce, close in product type but different spruce base versus pine; relevant in core function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sullivans Yuletide Indoor 5.92-Feet Artificial Garland in White | GD1511
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial garland but shorter length (around 6 feet), indoor use only, white color suggests different style; relevant but less similar in size and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Loon Peak Colorado Spruce Lighted Faux Swag
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lighted faux swag suggests smaller or different shape item compared to a garland; different silhouette and probable function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 2-Pack Pre-Lit Faux Spruce Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial spruce garland set, similar intended use but spruce and 2-pack differs from single pine garland; moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Mixed Country Pine Lighted Pine Christmas Tree Andover Mills
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Product name suggests a Christmas tree rather than a garland; despite pine and lights, function and shape different.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 9' Flocked Artificial Christmas Pre-Lit Garland with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit 9-foot artificial Christmas garland similar in size and function with flocking and clear lights, aligns well with reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 100' Canadian Pine Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very long length (100 feet) and generic Canadian Pine garland suggests commercial or large scale use, different from typical 9-foot garland for household decoration.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Lighted Christmas Tree Andover Mills
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Christmas tree, not a garland; different product type and use despite being lighted and Fraser fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Coen Norfolk Pine Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Norfolk Pine garland is a pine-type garland and likely artificial and decorative, similar core function but different specific pine type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 7ft Tall Pencil Prelit Artificial Christmas with 210 Warm White LED Lights and 499 Tips Charlton Home
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Product is a pencil-shaped tree rather than a garland; different silhouette and category though pre-lit and artificial.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 9Ft Pre-Lit Holiday Pre-Decorated Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit, 9 feet, garland for holiday decoration; very similar in function and size to reference product though less detail on pine type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: BrylaneHome 6' Pre-Lit Poinsettia Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit garland but decorated with poinsettias, shorter (6 feet), and floral decoration differs from pine branch style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 6ft Pre-Lit Decorated Artificial Christmas Garland with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit decorated artificial garland but shorter length (6 feet) with clear lights; somewhat similar but differing length and possible decoration.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 27' x 20" Pre-Lit Green Artificial Pine Christmas Garland with Warm White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial pine garland with warm white LED lights; longer (27 feet) and wider (20 inches), but similar product type and lighting features.
